description: In response to privacy concerns over Google Glass, Google says it won't allow facial recognition apps in its Google Play Store. How are app developers responding? And Turkey's prime minister is blaming Twitter for civil unrest in the country, calling social media the worst menace to society.
teaser: In response to privacy concerns over Google Glass, Google says it won't allow facial recognition apps in its Google Play Store. How are app developers responding? And Turkey's prime minister is blaming Twitter for civil unrest in the country, calling social media the worst menace to society.
title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, June 4, 2013
